thread.section_title: Red Wall Garden Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: have you ever been exited
thread.title_full: have you ever been exited - Review of Red Wall Garden Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Niclas100
title: have you ever been exited
text:
Have you ever been excited by eating in the restaurant of the hotel you are staying - me not - here its the case. BUT the hotel itself is just the place to be if you like it not to be mainstream and touristic. A charming retreat in the centre of the City.
Very cosy and nice rooms, perfect service.
A hotel in the old style with a magnificent inner yard - just great!
Stay there!
